trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_SEQ_00<tab>The Confederate turns to you with a puzzled glimmer in his eye.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_TODO_00<tab>Observe the target from the vantage point.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_TODO_01<tab>Report what you saw to the perplexed Confederate.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_TODO_02<tab>Rescue the sapphire-haired girl.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_TODO_03<tab>Aid the sapphire-haired girl.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_TODO_04<tab>Report to the perplexed Confederate.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_000<tab>You there. Have you got a minute?

TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_001<tab>I think I saw a girl collapsed on the beach, but I need to be sure. When you are up here for hours at a time, your eyes begin playing tricks on you. Here─take this telescope. Point it in that direction and tell me if you see her, too.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_005<tab>Take a look at the coast over there with the telescope. Do you see an unconscious girl?

TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>Search your surroundings for the unconscious girl. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target the humanoid figure on the beach and inspect them with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>With your telescope you spy a sapphire-haired girl. She appears to be unconscious.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_020<tab>So it is not just me, then?
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_021<tab>Do you think you could do me another favor and check up on her?
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_022<tab>I am afraid I cannot go there myself in case she is...well, you know...d-dead. Bah! Even just thinking about it gives me the shivers!
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_023<tab>Please, can you go and see if she is all right? I shall remain here, lest you end up having to take care of two unconscious people on the beach.

TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_AOGAMI_000_040<tab>Th-Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. You saved my life. I was gathering food from the sea when suddenly I was attacked by shore jellyfish. Their stings left me paralyzed, and I was washed ashore by the currents.

TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_AOGAMI_000_041<tab>Where I am from we are taught growing up to avoid contact with strangers. We would never go out of our way to rescue them. If it were not for your remarkable compassion, I would have no doubt died upon these shores, far away from home.

TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_AOGAMI_000_042<tab>As much as I would like to offer you a reward for what you have done for me, I sadly have nothing of value on me. If our paths should ever cross again, however, I shall be sure to give you something.
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_042<tab>You are back. W-Was she...alive?
TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_050<tab>I was watching the two of you from afar with my telescope. Kami be praised! It seems the girl was still alive. Did she tell you what happened to her?

TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_051<tab>Indeed? The waters carry a myriad of strange things our way, including people. Though, most of them are already d-dead by the time they reach us. That is why I am up here and not down there doing patrols.

TEXT_STMBDZ210_02682_MAN02682_000_052<tab>Had you not come when you did, I may have been forced to go down and deal with her myself. By the time I worked up the courage to do so, she might have been long gone. Please take this pouch of koban. You have saved not one, but two people today.
